attributes.action: open a full public enquiry and commece prosecution of 'Profiterring' oil companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the public would like to have answers to the following

1. why do petrol companies ut the fuel duty on on budget day and then again on the day it's due to go on

2. why do they never pass on the drop in oil prices

3. why even when oil prices drop do the pump prices rise

4. claim that they make no profit

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether to take cases to court following police investigations.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
